title: Font is blurry after config migration to toml
body:
After migration to toml using `alacritty migrate`, the fonts on my terminal look terrible. They were fine before upgrading to the latest version and being forced to migrate. Here's how it looks:
![image](https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty/assets/35728385/b6387987-1263-4c4c-b83c-338ee7ad3c68)
Also, trying to select text causes the wrong text to be selected. Again, it worked perfectly in the previous version.

Here's my current config file:
